description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are a fish in the ocean fighting to survive. Eat other fish, grow up, evolve and unlock new species. Watch unlocked fish in aquarium mode. Play with your friend in Coop mode or deathmatch game with ranking.  Eat or be eaten, be an ultimate fish !
description.short: You are a fish in the ocean fighting to survive. Eat other fish, grow up, evolve and unlock new species. Watch unlocked fish in aquarium mode. Play with your friend in Coop mode or deathmatch game with ranking.  Eat or be eaten, be an ultimate fish !
